mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sign (DRAFTEMP, EMPSIGN1, EMPSIGN2, SIGNFORMCODE, SIGNTITLE, SIGNCONTENT, SIGNFILENAME, SIGNFILEROOT) VALUES ( #{draftEmp}, #{empSign1}, #{empSign2}, #{signFormCode}, #{signTitle}, #{signContent}, #{signFileName}, #{signFileRoot} )
mapper.select: SELECT s.SIGNNUM, s.SIGNDATE, f.SIGNFORMFORMNAME, s.SIGNTITLE, t.SIGNNAME, s.SIGNCODE FROM sign s JOIN signform f ON s.SIGNFORMCODE = f.SIGNFORMCODE JOIN signtype t ON s.SIGNCODE = t.SIGNCODE WHERE s.SIGNCODE IN(1,2) AND s.DRAFTEMP = #{draftEmp} ORDER BY s.SIGNDATE DESC LIMIT 3

SELECT s.SIGNNUM, s.SIGNDATE, f.SIGNFORMFORMNAME, s.SIGNTITLE, t.SIGNNAME, s.SIGNCODE FROM sign s JOIN signform f ON s.SIGNFORMCODE = f.SIGNFORMCODE JOIN signtype t ON s.SIGNCODE = t.SIGNCODE WHERE s.SIGNCODE = 3 AND s.DRAFTEMP = #{draftEmp} ORDER BY s.SIGNDATE DESC LIMIT 3
